name: cpputest-test-adapter
description: Run your CppUTest tests in the Sidebar of Visual Studio Code
author: Benjamin Giesinger <benjamin.giesinger@gmail.com>

scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.publish:patch: npm run rebuild && vsce publish patch
scripts.publish:pre: npm run rebuild && vsce publish --pre-release -p $VSCE_TOKEN patch

cpputestTestAdapter.testExecutable.description: Executable that contains all tests. Can be multiple executables separated by semicolon. Wildcard is supported (e.g. myExecutable;bin/test/ut_*)

cpputestTestAdapter.testExecutablePath.description: Path where the executable should be run in

enumDescriptions: Selects the best fetch mode for the current operating system and CppUTest capabilities
Gets test location information by querying the test executables
Gets test location information from debug symbols in test executables

cpputestTestAdapter.logpanel.description: Write diagnostic logs to an output panel

cpputestTestAdapter.logfile.description: Write diagnostic logs to the given file

cpputestTestAdapter.debugLaunchConfigura.description: The name of the configuration object from the launch.json file to use for debugging tests. Defaults to the first profile
